meta.name: description
meta.content: Addison School District 4 is an elementary school district located in DuPage County, 18 miles west of downtown Chicago. The nine schools within the district educate 4,000 students from Early Childhood to 8th grade.

div.div: Addison School District 4 serves 4,000 preschool through eighth grade children in nine school facilities. Most of our students reside in Addison with a few living in the neighboring communities of Bensenville, Itasca, Lombard, Villa Park and Wood Dale. We are proud of the strong foundations that we provide our children to prepare them for high school and college or their careers. Eligible three to five year old children may attend the Addison Early Learning Center and 100% of our children participate in our full day kindergarten program. Our students attend one of seven (kindergarten through 5th grade) elementary schools based on the location of their residence. Families may use the address locator to identify their assigned elementary school based on their home address. All sixth, seventh, and eighth grade students attend Indian Trail Junior High School.

Governor Pritzker announced today, April 17, that all Illinois schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. Additional information regarding school programs and services will be shared with parents during the next week. Stay home, stay safe, stay healthy!

It’s time to register your returning student for the 2020-21 School year! Registration begins on April 15, 2020 and must be completed on or before May 26, 2020. For your convenience, Addison District 4 will continue using its online registration portal for all returning students. This online registration process will help expedite the registration process and assist with planning for the 2020-21 School Year.
You should be receiving information through the mail. Included in the packet are directions on how to complete the registration. Please contact your school office if you have any questions.
Casi es tiempo de inscribir a su estudiante que regresa para el año escolar 2020-21. Las Inscripciones comienzan el 15 de abril del 2020 y deben completarse a más tardar el 26 de mayo del 2020. Para su comodidad, el Distrito 4 de Addison se complace en ofrecer la opción de inscribirse en línea para todos los estudiantes que regresan. Este proceso de inscripción en línea ayudara a acelerar el proceso de inscripción y ayudara con la planificación para el año escolar 2020-21.
Usted recibira información por correo. En el paquete se incluyen instrucciones sobre cómo completar el registro. Comuníquese con la oficina de su escuela si tiene alguna pregunta.

The Addison Public Library is partnering with NEDFYS to offer virtual check-ins for IT students every Friday from 12 - 1pm. It's a chance to go over highs and lows from the week, connect with a good listener, and learn about some basic coping skills. Click on headline for a direct link to the meeting and a link to the event on the library's calendar.
